name: personal-budget
description: The goal of the project is to create a personal budget API. This API will be using the [envelope budgeting method](https://www.thebalancemoney.com/what-is-envelope-budgeting-1293682). Users will be able to use this api to create envelopes and set personal budgetting goals to track how much a user is spending and set limits. This project will be using Express.js to handle CRUD.
